name: json-schema-as-model
description: Library to facilitate the software modeling with JSON Schemas.

scripts.np: git remote rm origin && (np --publish false --cleanup false || echo Error on np) && git remote add origin git@github.com:TexKiller/json-schema-as-model.git && git push --follow-tags --set-upstream origin master
